title: 38 Things on Sale You’ll Actually Want to Buy: From Timberland to Mansur Gavriel
text:
38 items in this article 38 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the Retailers

You may have noticed some posts from our friends at the Strategist on the Cut. They’ll be dropping in every now and again, sharing their expertise on the basics you don’t have time to research and the weird and wonderful things you don’t yet know you need.

Labor Day’s come and gone, but the sales are still excellent — particularly when it comes to fall-appropriate wares, like a Barbour-esque coat from Need Supply, a pair of Fashion Timberlands, and a cozy, cropped sweatshirt from Everlane.

Everlane Lightweight French Terry Shrunken Hoodie $28 (was $40, now 30% off) Yeee! A few new things have been added to Everlane’s Choose What You Pay section, including this cropped sweatshirt that’s very Off-Duty Model. (And available in a whole bunch of colors.) $28 at Everlane Buy

Everlane Wide Leg Crop Patch Pocket Pant $41 (was $68, now 40% off) And these stretchy wide-legged cropped pants with retro front pockets are 40 percent off. $41 at Everlane Buy

Everlane ReNew Fleece Zip $48 (was $80, now 40% off) A nubby fleece jacket made from 100 percent recycled fabric. $48 at Everlane Buy

Timberland Kenniston Waterproof Leather Boot $80 (was $140, now 43% off) Some waterproof Tims with a sleek, somewhat pointed toe and low wedge heel. $80 at Nordstrom Rack Buy

Lululemon On My Level Duffel 30L $99 (was $158, now 37% off) This duffel from Lululemon has a “sweaty unmentionables” pocket. $99 at Lululemon Buy

STATE Ryder Lunch Bag $19 (was $35, now 46% off) All sale items at Anthropologie are an extra 20 percent off at checkout. This here is for the little one in need of a kicky new lunch bag. $19 at Anthropologie Buy

Make Beauty Satin Finish Powder Blush $12 (was $25, now 52% off) There’s a lot of makeup from brands we like on sale at Anthropologie. This Make Beauty blush is meant to provide a “translucent, natural glow.” $12 at Anthropologie Buy

Ilia Lipstick Crayon $12 (was $24, now 50% off) This Ilia lipstick crayon (available in a range of reds) combines smudge-free color with “healing” sesame, rose hip, and papaya oils. $12 at Anthropologie Buy

Herbivore Botanicals Sea Mist Coconut + Sea Salt Beach Wave Hair Mist $8 (was $20, now 60% off) Your beachside time-share may have ended, but you can still look like you just got back from the beach. This hair mist was made from Pacific sea salt. $8 at Anthropologie Buy

Frame Denim Tie Cuff Shirt $100 (was $239, now 58% off) A sweet little blouse that’s not sickly sweet. $100 at Nordstrom Rack Buy

BAGGU Duck Bag, Sailor Stripe $20 (was $34, now 41% off) A striped BAGGU canvas tote will never go out of style. $20 at Nordstrom Rack Buy

Billy Reid Waffle Knit Henley, Terracotta $45 (was $115, now 61% off) A henley from Billy Reid in a very autumnal shade of terra-cotta. $45 at Nordstrom Rack Buy

Photo: 18-04-16 Accessories AM1 B9 tedketterhagen W SunnyLife Cherry Party Drinkware Set $8 (was $30, now 73% off) For eight bucks, how can you resist? $8 at Nordstrom Rack Buy

Photo: 19-04-19 Accessories AM2 B1 johnficenec W Clare V. Fanny Pack $74 (was $245, now 70% off) This is a very excellent price for this very handsome Clare V. fanny pack. $74 at Shopbop Buy

KULE Modern Long Sleeve Tee, Purple/Poppy/Navy $69 (was $98, now 30% off) A purply addition to your stripes collection from stripes-specific line KULE. $69 at Shopbop Buy

Frame Short Sleeve Henley $84 (was $120, now 30% off) Another men’s henley (perhaps we’re nostalgic for 2017?), this one from Frame. $84 at Revolve Buy

Photo: URBANO House of Harlow 1960 x REVOLVE Violette Dress $90 (was $218, now 59% off) If there are any fall weddings on the horizon … $90 at Revolve Buy

Photo: URBANO Splits59 Pin Tank $27 (was $58, now 53% off) A running tank from Splits59 that’s reminiscent of (but a lot nicer than) the one you wore in high school. $27 at Revolve Buy

A.L.C. Kati Puff-Sleeve Tee, Neon Yellow $81 (was $135, now 40% off) This neon-yellow A.L.C. going-out shirt is sort of secretly also a machine washable T-shirt that you can wear to run errands. $81 at Saks Fifth Avenue Buy

NEED Workwear Cotton Jacket in Dark Olive $78 (was $195, now 60% off) A Barbour-esque jacket from Need Supply’s house line. $78 at Need Supply Co. Buy

Hunter Kitten Heel Glossy Chelsea Welly Boot in Navy $128 (was $203, now 37% off) For those who don’t want to sacrifice style (and an extra few inches) when it rains. $128 at ASOS Buy

Martha Stewart Collection Enameled Cast Iron 2-Qt. Heart-Shaped Casserole $40 (was $100, now 60% off) All things being equal, we probably would not buy a heart-shaped casserole, but this puppy is $40, and the color is cute. $40 at Macy's Buy

Free People Make My Day Printed Border-Trim Set $52 (was $148, now 65% off) This is sort of the two-piece equivalent of the Amazon Nightgown Dress. $52 at Macy's Buy

JBL Bluetooth Wireless Headphones, Black $70 (was $100, now 30% off) These wireless headphones from JBL last for 16 hours between charges. $70 at Macy's Buy

Mansur Gavriel Knotted Suede-Trimmed Leather Loafers $198 (was $495, now 60% off) A jaunty pair of loafers that’ll get you excited about fall. $198 at The Outnet Buy

Barbara Barry Dream Peaceful Pique Fountain Oblong Throw Pillow in White $31 (was $125, now 75% off) We cannot resist a scalloped anything, let alone a 75 percent off throw pillow. $31 at Bed Bath & Beyond Buy

Joseph Joseph Square Colander $4 (was $15, now 73% off) This square colander from Joseph Joseph is perfect for blueberries and black beans. $4 at Bed Bath & Beyond Buy

Calvin Klein Form Bikini, Navy Stripe $4 (was $13, now 69% off) While we’re in the bargain bin, this is a good price for some simple Calvin Klein undies. $4 at Walmart Buy

MoDRN Industrial Speckle 4 Piece Bowl Set, Grey $12 (was $22, now 45% off) It works out to three bucks a bowl. $12 at Walmart Buy

Orla Kiely Backpack Tote $164 (was $180, now 9% off) Not the best discount in the world, but we were very taken with this Orla Kiely backpack. $164 at Zappos Buy

COACH Melody Western Stitch Bootie $148 (was $279, now 47% off) Not quite a cowboy boot, not quite a Chelsea boot, but somewhere in the middle that feels right. $148 at Zappos Buy

Rodarte Rosette-Appliqué Tulle Gown $6,670 (was $11,118, now 40% off) If we were going to get married again … we’d splurge on this red Rodarte dress. $6,670 at Matches Fashion Buy

Boston Linen Co. 400 Thread Count, 100% Cotton Sheet Set, Queen These 400-thread-count, 100 percent cotton sheets from Boston Linen Co. (which one reviewer said are “like sleeping on the best hotel bed”) are on sale today only. $43 at Amazon Buy

Nebula by Anker Prizm II 200 ANSI Lumens Full HD 1080p LED Multimedia Projector Also on sale today (Friday) only: this inexpensive (ish) “starter” projector from Anker. There are a bunch of other Anker projectors on sale, too. $230 at Amazon Buy

get the strategist newsletter Actually good deals, smart shopping advice, and exclusive discounts. Email Terms & Privacy Notice By submitting your email, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Notice and to receive email correspondence from us.

The Strategist is designed to surface the most useful, expert recommendations for things to buy across the vast e-commerce landscape. Some of our latest conquests include the best acne treatments, rolling luggage, pillows for side sleepers, natural anxiety remedies, and bath towels. We update links when possible, but note that deals can expire and all prices are subject to change.
description: This edition of our Friday Sales roundup includes discounted goodies from Timberland, Walmart, Mansur Gavriel, Hunter Boots, Coach, Frame, Snow Peak, and more.
